<title level="1" right="Rules">[Services](/Rules.aspx?ID=2215)</title>

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 294 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
The services listed on [Basic Services and Cuisine ](/Equipment.aspx?Category=2) describe expenditures that can come up during travels and time spent in settlements.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<document level="2" id="rules-2216" />

<document level="2" id="rules-2217" />
